name: SmörgasGORGE
description:
s m rr g s g rr g e

Cram as much food in your gob as you can. 

DONT EAT THE  CUTLERY.

CONTROLS:

Left Stick: move left arm

Right Stick: move right arm

Left Bumper / Trigger: swat left hand

Right Bumper / Trigger: swat right hand

developed for the 2019 Global Game Jam with PIGSquad
